options.name: Idealism
options.description: You are idealistic. You gain +1 resolve a day, but when you are broken or numbed, you roll a penalty dice to attempt to end the condition.

options.name: Positive Idealism
options.description: You are enthusiastic to share your ideas and beliefs and present your case well. Gain +1 skill to persuasion. Additionally, gain +2 resolve.

options.name: Manifesto
options.description: You are a visionary and have often put your dream to quill and scroll. You gain +1 skill with academics. Additionally, when you persuasion attempts made through writing gain a bonus dice.

options.name: Downtime Action : Conversion
options.description: You spend time, asserting your views in an attempt to bring a non-hostile individual along to your line of thinking. Your success is tied to a persuasion check; of an 6-9 is midly successful and suggests a good dialogue, while a 10 or higher is very successful and may convince or convert an individual. On a perfect check, the you are able to convert even the most stubborn individual.

options.name: Daily Reacton : Fervent Conviction
options.description: In response to either losing resolve or taking psychic damage, roll a resilience check. On a 6 or higher, the loss or damage is completely mitigated, otherwise, the damage or loss of resolve is doubled.

options.name: Action : Reinforced Idealism
options.description: You take the Defense action, but instead of gaining just a bonus dice to evasion and deflection, you gain a bonus dice to any contested or defensive check you make.
Gain +1 talent with social and +1 skill with persuasion.
